name: Sesame Noodle Salad
description: Noodle this! Create a dairy-free, creamy, tangy dressing that will go with any noodle, salad green, or grain to banish salad boredom. Made with nutritional yeast, our Sesame Noodle Salad Dressing Mix delivers a big fist bump of umami-rich flavour while dropping a bomb of B vitamins to boost your energy levels and brain power.

ingredients.name: uncooked noodles, such as fettuccine, rice or buckwheat

preparation: Cook noodles in Multipurpose Pot according to package directions. Drain.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, whisk dressing mix with vinegar and water. Whisk in mustard. Slowly whisk in oil and sesame oil.
Toss noodles and vegetables with dressing to combine.
tips: Whisk dressing in no time with Air Wand!
This recipe is free from common allergens like dairy, nuts, soy, and eggs. If you’re allergic to mustard, swap it with honey or mayo, or omit it completely.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein.

products.name: Sesame Noodle Salad Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is everything! It’s creamy, nutty, garlicky, and umami—and it’s dairy-free, nut-free, soy-free, and egg-free! Blend it with pantry staples and drizzle the flavour of turmeric, ginger, and garlic on everything from noodle salads and poke bowls to veggies, stir-fries, and more!
